def_en: The practical aspects of something involve real situations and events, rather than just ideas and theories.

def_cn: （人）明智的，注重实效的，务实的
def_en: You describe people as practical when they make sensible decisions and deal effectively with problems.

def_cn: （意见和方法）切实有效的，可行的
def_en: Practical ideas and methods are likely to be effective or successful in a real situation.

def_cn: （衣物等）实用的，适合特定用途的
def_en: You can describe clothes and things in your house as practical when they are suitable for a particular purpose rather than just being fashionable or attractive.

def_cn: 实验课；实践课；实验考核
def_en: A practical is an examination or a lesson in which you make things or do experiments rather than simply writing answers to questions.
